ProjectBrowseView.ActivateText: All future references imported via the browser extension will be added to this project
ProjectBrowseView.ShareText: To share this project with others, please type or paste their email addresses and click Share
ProjectBrowseView.CloneText: This operation will clone this project and all of its references
ProjectBrowseView.DeleteText: Doing so will delete the metadata of this project permanently. The references of this project can still be found in the References View
ProjectBrowseView.DeleteTextShare: This operation will stop you from accessing this shared project in the future. Are you sure?
ProjectBrowseView.DeleteTextConfirm: Confirm you want to delete this project by typing its name:
ProjectBrowseView.whatIsName: What is the name of this new project?

ProjectDetailsView.shareOthersDialog: To share this project with others, please type or paste their email addresses and click Share.
ProjectDetailsView.morethan1ref: ... more than 1 references are newly added; refresh the page to see them ...
ProjectDetailsView.ourExtension: Our browser extensions support one-click reference importation
ProjectDetailsView.itOnlyTakes: It only takes a click for you to import references to this project from major academic search aggregators:
ProjectDetailsView.anExampleScholar: an example of searching for "technology" on Google Scholar
ProjectDetailsView.anExampleUserAuth: an example paper titled "User Authentication via Electrical Muscle Stimulation"
ProjectDetailsView.anExampleRfid: an example paper titled "RFID Tag and RF Structures on a Paper Substrate Using Inkjet-Printing Technology"
ProjectDetailsView.anExampleRethink: an example paper titled "Rethinking student-teacher relationships in higher education: a multidimensional approach"
ProjectDetailsView.addmanually: You can also add a reference manually by clicking the button by the search bar.
ProjectDetailsView.updateProjectInfo: Updating your project information allows us to provide the most helpful insights into your literature.
ProjectDetailsView.numberOfRecommendations: <0><0>{{number}}</0></0><1>articles are recommended based on your writing and the references in this project</1>
ProjectDetailsView.accessInsightDashboardNote: Accessing Insight Dashboard is a premium feature. You can upgrade your account to use it.
ProjectDetailsView.accessInsightDashboardNoteFree: Insight Dashboard is not supported for projects owned by users of the free tier.
ProjectDetailsView.analyzingRightNow: We are analysing your writing and the references in this project to provide the best article recommendations. Please check again later.
ProjectDetailsView.targetVenue: What is your target venue (journal/conference) for this project?
ProjectDetailsView.gotIt: Got it. It will take us sometime to analyse the target venue!
ProjectDetailsView.updatingVenueNote: Updating the venue information allows us to analyze your target journal or conference. The analytics provides insights into the trending topics and standards of the venue.

ReferenceBrowseView.GSExample: an example of searching for 'technology' on Google Scholar
ReferenceBrowseView.ACMExample: an example paper titled 'User Authentication via Electrical Muscle Stimulation'

ReferenceBrowseView.SpringerExample: an example paper titled 'Rethinking student-teacher relationships in higher education: a multidimensional approach'
ReferenceBrowseView.AlsoManual: You can also add a reference manually by clicking the ADD REFERENCES button

application.ChromeText: Citasion's free browser extension helps you import citations from Google Scholar, PubMed, ACM Digital Library, and many research aggregators, as well as manage references in
application.WordText: Citasion's free Word Add-in helps you manage ciatations and references in Word.
application.WordNote2: extension is still required for reference importation

AccountView.Name: Name
AccountView.PremiumFeatures1: Unlimited number of references and projects
AccountView.ProcessingInfo: Your transaction is being processed. If this page does not update itself, you can refresh it in minutes.
AccountView.CancelText: Are you sure to cancel your subscription of Citasion Premium?
AccountView.willExpire: Your premium trial will expire by .
AccountView.currentSubscription: Your current subscription is canceled but you can still use Citasion premium untill the expiration date.

HomeView.intro: Intuitive reference management built for collaborations on the web.
HomeView.check2: Sharable reference projects for collaborative writing
HomeView.check3: Citation recommender, grammar checker, and writing assistant
HomeView.check5: Smart insights into your literature and reference list
HomeView.VideoTitle: Citasion - Need Help Writing a Paper?
HomeView.note1Text: A project-based reference management built for the web. Works with Google Docs, Word, and Overleaf. Support for desktop and tablets.
HomeView.note2Text: Share your references projects and insights with others. Write and manage references collaboratively and with ease.
HomeView.note3Text: A.I. powered system finds the paper you are about to cite, and provides tailored recommendations for your research projects.
HomeView.worksOnline: Works Online Where You Write and Cite
HomeView.getStarted: Get started for free and manage your references with ease
HomeView.check6: Works on desktop and tablets on Windows, macOS, Linux and Android*

LoginIframeView.loginNote: Log in Citasion now to unlock:
LoginIframeView.check2: Easy referencing for Google Docs, Overleaf and Word
LoginIframeView.protectionNote: This site is protected by reCAPTCHA and the <2>Google Privacy Policy</2> and <6>Terms of Service</6> apply.

LoginView.captchaNote: This site is protected by reCAPTCHA and the <2>Google Privacy Policy</2> and <6>Terms of Service</6> apply.
LoginView.pageDescription: Log in to your Citasion Account and manage your references with ease.

RegisterView.pageDesc: Register a Citasion Account and manage your references with ease.

EmailVerification.title: Email Verification Required
EmailVerification.text: Your email needs to verified in order to access your account. Please visit your email and follow the instructions that are provided there.

CampaignStarter.elevate: Elevate Your Reference Management to a New Level
CampaignStarter.goBeyond: Go beyond reference management. Choose a premium plan to ensure effective collaborative academic writing and get deep insights into your literature for every paper you write.
CampaignStarter.currentList: The current list of other research aggregators includes ACM Digital Library, PubMed, Springer, and IEEE Xplore. We are working hard to expand the list constantly.
CampaignStarter.identifyYearGaps: Identify year gaps in your literature review
CampaignStarter.recommendTheMost: Recommend the most relevant literature to the paper that you are working on
CampaignStarter.grabTheNext: Grab the next reference that you are about to cite.
CampaignStarter.formsOfPayment: What forms of payment do you accept?
CampaignStarter.formsOfPaymentAccepted: We accept major credit cards (e.g., Visa, American Express, Mastercard, Discover) and PayPal.
CampaignStarter.premiumPlan: What does the Premium Plan include?
CampaignStarter.premiumPlanDetails: Citasion's Premium Plan offers unlimited numbers of projects and references, advanced literature analytics, recommendations, venue analytics, and unlimited PDF paper storage.
CampaignStarter.volumeDiscounts: Do you have any volume discounts?
CampaignStarter.tryPremium: Can I try Citasion Premium for free?
CampaignStarter.tryPremiumAnswer: Yes! All users on the Free Plan can try out Citasion Premium for 90 days. All it takes is to create a free Citasion account. After that, you can revist this page, and the option of free trial will show up.
CampaignStarter.pageDesc: Take your reference management to the next level of efficiency.
CampaignStarter.premiumExpire: Your premium trial will expire by <2><0>{{expiryDate}}</0></2>.
CampaignStarter.volumeDiscountsAnswer: Yes! We offer volume discounts on annual plans for more than 5 members. Please <2><0>contact us</0></2> if you’re buying a plan for more than 5 members.
